mcq.statement: Grammatically correct: a. He is a more better basketball player than his brother. b. He is the most good basketball player than his brother. c. He is a better basketball player than his brother d. He is the best basketball player in his family.

options.a: He is a more better basketball player than his brother.
options.b: He is the most good basketball player than his brother.
options.c: He is a better basketball player than his brother
options.d: He is the best basketball player in his family.
